=========================
A Example of links_params
=========================

.. code:: python

  params = {x6: 0.196, #Leg 0 base body l
            y6: -0.05,
            z6: 0,
            x7: 0,
            y7: -0.076,
            z7: 0,
            x8: 0,
            y8: 0,
            z8: -0.21,
            x0: 0,
            y0: 0,
            z0: -0.19,
            x9: 0.196, # Leg 1
            y9: 0.05,
            z9: 0,
            x10: 0,
            y10: 0.076,
            z10: 0,
            x11: 0,
            y11: 0,
            z11: -0.21,
            x1: 0,
            y1: 0,
            z1: -0.19,
            x12: -0.196, # Leg 2
            y12: -0.05,
            z12: 0,
            x13: 0,
            y13: -0.076,
            z13: 0,
            x14: 0,
            y14: 0,
            z14: -0.21,
            x2: 0,
            y2: 0,
            z2: -0.19,
            x15: -0.196, # Leg 3
            y15: 0.05,
            z15: 0,
            x16: 0,
            y16: 0.076,
            z16: 0,
            x17: 0,
            y17: 0,
            z17: -0.21,
            x3: 0,
            y3: 0,
            z3: -0.19}
